title: It’s Not Like That!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Hmm.... This is hard....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, Maki-chan. I’m trying to fix a frayed part of my costume right now, but it’s really delicate, so I’m not sure how to do it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>If it’s about costumes, why don’t you just ask Kotori about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, but Kotori-chan seems busy. Besides, I’d like to be able to fix something like this on my own.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm.... Let me see it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh? Ah, sure. It’s this part.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>The chiffon part, huh.... This does look difficult. But you can probably do something like this here and.... There, it’s done.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Waaah, you’re right! As expected of Maki-chan, you’re really handy~! I’m sure you’ll do a careful and delicate job as a doctor in the future when you’re this skilled. I’d love to be examined by you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeeh!? No, please take care of yourself so that you don’t need to get examined by me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>To worry about me like that, you really are a good girl, huh, Maki-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez! Stop saying that! I’m telling you it’s not like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
